note:
Tech Mary Poppins in red pants.

I work with international NGOs and companies in a long list of countries.

I provide an understanding of the role technology must play in support of achieving that organization's goals.

I also do really nerdy implementation and change management of complex systems while team building and ensuring the changes are successful.

It's pretty fun and I get to live in some lovely places.

Available: NA (current), EU, EMEA, APAC.
~3 month - 3 year terms.
